code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(_ref){let{setNotes,setIsLoggedIn,setUsername}=_ref;const[username,setLocalUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const handleLogin=async()=>{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:8000/api/login/',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({username,password})});const data=await response.json();if(response.ok){setUsername(username);setNotes(data.notes);setIsLoggedIn(true);}else{alert(data.error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",onChange:e=>setLocalUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogin,style:{marginLeft:'10px',padding:'10px 20px',backgroundColor:'#007bff',color:'white',border:'none',borderRadius:'5px',cursor:'pointer'},children:"Login"})]});}export default Login;
